code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const calculateDiscount=()=>{if(!product.originalPrice||!product.salePrice)return 0;return Math.round((product.originalPrice-product.salePrice)/product.originalPrice*100);};const formatPrice=price=>{return new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR',{style:'currency',currency:'BRL'}).format(price);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card fade-in",children:[product.image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:5000${product.image}`,alt:product.name,className:"card-img",onError:e=>{e.target.src='https://via.placeholder.com/300x200?text=Sem+Imagem';}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"original-price",children:formatPrice(product.originalPrice)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sale-price",children:formatPrice(product.salePrice)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"discount-badge",children:["-",calculateDiscount(),"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:product.affiliateLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn btn-primary",style:{width:'100%',textAlign:'center'},children:"Ver Oferta"})}),product.category&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'0.5rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{style:{color:'#666'},children:["Categoria: ",product.category]})})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
